billPattern.description: How bills are typically structured for Bolts Plus
notes: READ DESCRIPTION to determine correct item:
- Bolts, screws, nuts, washers, socket caps → Components:Fastener (most common)
- Drill bits, taps, dies, tools → Tools & Equipment
- Metal stock, bars, plates → Raw Materials
Description includes part number and full description (e.g., '1/4-20 X 2-1/2 SOCKET CAP 18.8 STAINLESS')
PO# field often contains employee name (e.g., 'Ilan') rather than formal PO number

purchaseOrderPattern.description: Orders often verbal with employee name as reference
notes: PO# field typically contains employee name who placed order
If formal PO needed, use Subcontractor item

warnings: DO NOT use 'Job Type:Manufacturing Job' - that's for customer invoices only
DO NOT use 'Subcontractor' items - choose from Fastener/Tools/Raw Materials based on description
MUST read line item description to select correct item (Fastener vs Tools vs Raw Material)
PO# on their invoices is often an employee name, not a formal PO number
